attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The religious basis of all law enshrines the ten commandments and the testaments.

Part of the problem here, is that terrorists believe themselves to be acting on behalf of a higher being, be it Allah or God, not on behalf of the state, the police or international bodies like the UN - whose actions are democratically regulated. Enemies are manmade incarnations.

So behaviour analysts might argue that acts of religious violence aren't viewed as criminal acts against humanity - but carried out to promote faith.

Respect for life, peace, justice and religious tolerance means ethically above all else doing no harm to others. 

Urge cleric Muqtada al-Sadr who professes that he has peace & the interests of his followers at heart, to bring his community to tribunals  negotiating a settlement rather than declaring war. There is no place in peace - keeping for threats.
